Episodes.Title: The Summer Palace
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Still addled from the events in England, Kendall tries to make amends with his dad; Logan receives some unvarnished advice from his financial banker; Tom maneuvers for a new position in the company.

Episodes.Title: Vaulter
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Jon Brown, Alice Birch
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Roman and Kendall do a "routine health check" of a new media brand to help Vaulter determine the future of the company; Tom tasks Greg with sniffing out waste at ATN; Connor and Willa host a soiree to mark their return to New York.

Episodes.Title: Hunting
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Tony Roche, Alice Birch
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Logan informs his skeptical management team of his plan to make another attempt to acquire Pierce; Greg worries his pre-meeting will put his standing with the family at risk; Connor's presidential announcement irritates Logan.

Episodes.Title: Safe Room
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Georgia Pritchett, Alice Birch
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Roman begins a six-week management training program in the Parks division; Logan and Kendall arrange a covert meeting with a PGM CEO as a controversy surrounding a star anchor leads to a day of chaos at ATN headquarters.

Episodes.Title: Tern Haven
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Will Tracy, Alice Birch
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Shiv, Roman and Connor veer from their roles at a weekend retreat to woo the Pierces.

Episodes.Title: Argestes
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Susan Soon He Stanton, Alice Birch
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Logan's deal with the Pierces is threatened; Kendall, Shiv and Roman differ on damage control strategies.

Episodes.Title: Return
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Jonathan Glatzer, Alice Birch
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: A trip to the UK finds the Roy kids negotiating with their mother; Logan turns to Rhea for advice.

Episodes.Title: Dundee
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Mary Laws, Alice Birch
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: The entire Roy clan travels to Logan's hometown of Dundee, Scotland, for a celebration of Logan's 50 years in the business; Kendall becomes enamored with Jennifer, an actress in Willa's play; a former employee proves difficult to ...

Episodes.Title: DC
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Logan, Kendall, Gerri and Tom testify before Congress; Shiv speaks candidly to Kira, a victim who is set to be a key witness; in Turkey, Roman's business pitch takes a chilling turn.

Episodes.Title: This Is Not for Tears
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Logan looks for a sacrificial lamb among his closest allies as the future of the company hangs in the balance.
